hadiths.text: Ibn Tawus narrated from his father that Ibn 'Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade a city-dweller to sell for a Bedouin." (Sahih)I (Tawus) said to Ibn 'Abbas: "What is meant by the words: 'A city-dweller selling for a Bedouin?' He said: "He should not be a broker for him

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ أَنْ يَبِيعَ حَاضِرٌ لِبَادٍ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition Of A City-Dweller Selling On Behalf Of A Bedouin
